mapper.select: select username as name, sum(if(message = '登录', 1, 0)) as value from op_log group by name order by value desc limit #{limit}
select date_format(requested_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as name, sum(if(message = '登录', 1, 0)) as value from op_log where requested_at >= date_sub(curdate(), interval #{days} day) group by name order by name
mapper.insert: insert into op_log ( requested_at, client_ip, username, message ) values ( #{requestedAt}, #{clientIp}, #{username}, #{message} )
